channel.title: Apps Status Dashboard
channel.description: Updates on performance information for Google Apps services from the Google Apps Status Dashboard (http://www.google.com/appsstatus#hl=en). Unless otherwise noted, this status information applies to consumer services as well as services for organizations using Google Apps.

item.title: Gmail
item.description:
November 25, 2014 1:11:00 PM PST

We're investigating reports of an issue with Gmail. We will provide more information shortly.
